modName: Hellsing Ultimate- Control Restriction System Level 1
descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][center][size=6]
HELLSING ULTIMATE[/size][/center][/font][center][font=Times New Roman]


[/font][font=Times New Roman][youtube]Vjn43RIlOj4[/youtube][/font][/center][font=Times New Roman]

[/font]
[center][font=sans-serif][/font][/center][center][font=sans-serif]============================================================================================================[/font]
[font=sans-serif][b][u][color=#f4cccc][size=5]Description[/size][/color][/u][/b][/font]
[font=sans-serif]============================================================================================================[/font]
[font=sans-serif][/font][size=4]
[font=sans-serif]



Alucard's power is restrained by a series of seals presumably made by Hellsing (known as the Control Art Restriction System). Alucard can release the
seals up to Level 1. [/font]It is a spell power, its sole purpose is to DESTROY. 
If you're like me and enjoy mods that will give you the option to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18388/?]Kill Any NPC[/url]...Well...it'll do just that...to the point where they wont be recognized.

[color=#ff0000]Very Overpowered[/color]

Be careful how you use it

It is not Lore Friendly, (not like it ever was in the show)
[/size]

[size=4]If you dont hear from me right away I am either AFK, creating more Anime Mods or busy with everyday "Life" but I am constantly updating to release the mods that the community would love to see.


I'm only one person guys, so NATURALLY all mod have their flaws, all the better to show room for[color=#00ff00] IMPROVEMENT[/color].[/size][/center]
